description.@en: A Jailer knows every trick necessary to pry information from others. Psychological intimidation is their primary tool; acid, scissors, pincers and thumbscrews are reserved only for the most unyielding of prisoners. Between the bleeding and the screams, the Jailer knows when a prisoner is telling the truth, or simply lying to escape further pain.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Interrogation Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. In addition, when you successfully interrogate someone, you may inflict any Moderate or Serious Injury of your choice or cause them to suffer from Stress or Fear.
